thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: victor evaristo
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by victor evaristo

author: victor evaristo
title: victor evaristo
text:
I know from listening to people's experiences on monthly boxes, I was a little sceptical that this was to good to be true.
When my first box came I could not be any happier, not only with my box that came with top notch lures and baits found in stores. Also the instructions and resources on how to use them. The next thing that is just if not more important customer service. Nicole made as great an impression as the quality of this product. Providing quick responses to all my emails and most of all the information she passed on was accurate. LBT nailed it great product great customer service. So the bottom line would I recommend LTB ? Ask my buddy who has been completely shut out the last month, as I yank monster bass out of our lake.
